Name: The Grand Ziggurat of Atlan
CardText: The first tactic you deploy each round costs 1 less to play. This can’t reduce the cost to be lower than 1.

Name: Forgotten Sepulchre
CardText: At replenishment, you may seal away the top card of your Army deck face down underneath (). Then, if there are 3 cards underneath (), sacrifice it, discard your hand and put the sealed away cards into your hand.

Name: Dawnslaked Mastaba
CardText: IV, ø: Tactics in your graveyard with tier-II or lower have Recall 4 (You may deploy this tactic from your graveyard by sealing away 4 other cards from your graveyard as an additional cost. Then, seal away this tactic).

Name: Nomads
CardText: Assembly 3 — When this villager enters your Heartland, if you are fielding 3 or more villages with Assembly, Premonition 1 (Look at the top card of one of your decks, then put that card on the top or bottom of that deck).
